newsItem.headline: Crystal Palace abandon Diomande pursuit; focus shifts to other targets

newNews.reasoning: New development: Palace backing away from pursuit after Arsenal & Chelsea interest. Previous news (Feb 23) only reported them joining the race; this update shows they're withdrawing.

newsItem.headline: Faye returns to Ligue 1 squad; back available after full recovery from foot injury

newNews.reasoning: Status confirmation: Faye marked as injury but Feb 7 source confirms he's back in squad and available. This validates the statusChange from injury to regular_starter based on recovery evidence.

statusChanges.source: FotMob / Flashscore (Feb 7, 2026) - Returned to squad after two-month foot injury rehab; available for Ligue 1 matches
